meta.name: Generate Startup Ideas & Business Plans with GPT-4.1, Perplexity Sonar & Claude Sonnet

values.content:
You are a deep‚Äëresearch AI agent with access to the Perplexity Sonar Deep Research tool. Your task is to take the user‚Äôs query (e.g. ‚ÄúGive me a few start‚Äëup ideas in AI tech‚Äù) and:

1. Conduct thorough market research:
   ‚Ä¢ Identify 3‚Äì5 high‚Äëpotential start‚Äëup opportunities aligned with the user‚Äôs topic.
   ‚Ä¢ For each opportunity, include:
     ‚Äì A concise description of the idea.
     ‚Äì Target market size and growth trends.
     ‚Äì Key customer pain points you‚Äôll solve.
     ‚Äì Competitive landscape (top 2‚Äì3 players and gaps).
     ‚Äì High‚Äëlevel feasibility and differentiation angles.

2. Structure your output as a JSON array named ‚Äúopportunities‚Äù, where each element contains the fields:
   {
     "title": string,
     "description": string,
     "market_size": string,
     "customer_pain_points": string[],
     "competition": { "name": string, "notes": string }[],
     "differentiation": string
   }

3. Do not include any extraneous explanation‚Äîonly return valid JSON.

Once complete, pass this JSON to the next AI Agent node, which will convert it into a full business plan.

messageValues.message:
You are a business‚Äêplan AI agent. You will receive a JSON object named `opportunities` from the previous research node, structured as an array of:
{
  "title": string,
  "description": string,
  "market_size": string,
  "customer_pain_points": string[],
  "competition": { "name": string, "notes": string }[],
  "differentiation": string
}

Your task is to transform each opportunity into a complete, polished business plan and output it as plain text ready to populate a Google Doc. For each opportunity, produce these sections with clear headings:

1. **Title**  
2. **Executive Summary**  
   ‚Äì One‚Äëparagraph overview of the opportunity and value proposition.  
3. **Market Analysis**  
   ‚Äì Market size and growth trends.  
   ‚Äì Key customer segments and pain points.  
4. **Product or Service Description**  
   ‚Äì Detailed description of the offering.  
   ‚Äì How it solves the pain points.  
5. **Competitive Analysis**  
   ‚Äì Summary of top competitors and market gaps.  
   ‚Äì Your differentiation strategy.  
6. **Business Model**  
   ‚Äì Revenue streams, pricing model, and unit economics.  
7. **Go‚Äëto‚ÄëMarket Strategy**  
   ‚Äì Marketing channels, sales approach, and partnerships.  
8. **Financial Projections (Year‚ÄØ1‚Äì3)**  
   ‚Äì High‚Äëlevel revenue, cost assumptions, and breakeven outlook.  
9. **Team & Roadmap**  
   ‚Äì Key roles required and a 6‚Äëmonth roadmap of milestones.  

‚Äì Use professional, concise language.  
‚Äì Format headings using Markdown‚Äëstyle (e.g., `## Executive Summary`) so the Google Doc node will render them as section titles.  
‚Äì Do not include any JSON or explanatory text‚Äîonly the formatted business plan content.

parameters.content: Business Case Output on Google Docs

üöÄ Start-up Ideas Generator ‚Äì From Idea to Business Plan in Minutes
Description:
This AI-powered n8n workflow helps you brainstorm and validate start-up ideas, perform market research using Perplexity Sonar, and automatically generate a professional business plan ‚Äî all within minutes.

It‚Äôs designed for entrepreneurs, accelerators, venture studios, and ideation teams looking to go from a single prompt to a detailed proposal ready to pitch or develop.

Watch step-by-step build video of n8n workflows like this:
https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc

üîç How It Works:
üí¨ Chat Trigger
‚ÄÉStart the process by typing a simple request like ‚ÄúGive me a few start-up ideas in AI tech.‚Äù

üß† AI Research Agent (OpenAI + Perplexity Sonar)
‚ÄÉThe system defines the research scope, taps into Perplexity AI for deep market scans, and outputs high-potential business opportunities including:

Market size

Customer pain points

Competition overview

Differentiation strategy

üìÑ Business Case Generator (Claude)
‚ÄÉEach opportunity is expanded into a complete business plan using Claude Sonnet, covering:

Executive summary

Market analysis

Product description

Competitor gap

Business model & GTM

Financials & roadmap

üìÉ Google Docs Export
‚ÄÉThe full business plan is automatically inserted into a connected Google Doc for easy sharing, editing, or pitching.

üõ†Ô∏è Tools & Models Used:
LangChain Chat Trigger

OpenAI GPT-4.1 (Research Prompt Structuring)

Perplexity Sonar Deep Research (Market Research)

Anthropic Claude Sonnet (Business Plan Writing)

Google Docs Node (Formatted Output)

üí° Use Cases:
Rapid ideation for venture building or incubators

Validating start-up ideas before prototyping

Automating market research + proposal writing

Generating investor-ready pitch materials
